title: Software
text:
R Packages

TRES (Tensor Regression with Envelope Structure) 
Summary: Provides three estimators for tensor response regression (TRR) and tensor predictor regression (TPR) models with tensor envelope structure. The three types of estimation approaches are generic and can be applied to any envelope estimation problems.
Reference: Zeng, J., Wang, W., and Zhang, X. (2021). TRES: An R Package for Tensor Regression and Envelope Algorithms. Journal of Statistical Software, 99, 1-31.

title: Research
text:

title: Jing Zeng (曾靖)
text:
Associate Professor (tenure-track)
International Institute of Finance
School of Management
University of Science and Technology of China

title: About me
text:
Welcome! I am an Associate Professor (tenure-track) at International Institute of Finance, School of Management, University of Science and Technology of China (USTC). I received my Ph.D. degree from Florida State University (FSU) in 2022 under the supervision of Professor Xin Henry Zhang and Professor Qing Mai. I received my B.S. degree from USTC in 2017.
My research interests mainly cover dimension reduction, high-dimensional statistics, and tensor data analysis. I am also interested in applications in other fields, e.g., medical science, machine learning, finance, etc.


Education

2017/08–2022/05: Ph.D. in Statistics, Florida State University.
2013/08–2017/06: B.S. in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics, University of Science and Technology of China.




Employment

2022/07–Present: Associate Professor (tenure-track), International Institute of Finance, School of Management, University of Science and Technology of China.




Research Interests

Dimension reduction
High-dimensional statistics
Robust statistics
Tensor data analysis







Awards

2022/12: R.A. Bradley Award for the best PhD dissertation in the Department of Statistics, Florida State University.
2018/10: Best First Year Student in Applied Statistics Award for outstanding achievement as a graduate student, Florida State University
